Bold fancy text: [ft text=CAT params=~tf_b/] 

Some emoji: 😶‍🌫️, 🧔🏻‍♀️, 🧑🏿‍❤️‍🧑🏾 

Okay. Simple image shortcode [img src=file/] 

Tinted image shortcode [img src=file tint=#FF0000/][img src=file tint=#00FF00/] 

Image shortcode with missing res [img src=faile/] (also can be tinted => [img src=faile tint=#00FFFF/])
